dmca.title: Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: MTL Media Networks Inc. [mailto:mtlmedia@videotron.ca] 
Sent: Thursday, February 03, 2005 1:26 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: FW: Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity
Importance: High
Sensitivity: Confidential

 

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity
 
URL: http://sattech.ca/forums/index.php,
CASE #: [snip]
 
03 February 2005
 
Dear Sir or Madam,
 
This letter serves as notification under the Canadian and American Federal
laws.
Canada
